subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: David Beckham was back on his feet and walking on crutches in Turku, Finland, a day after having surgery to repair the torn Achilles’ tendon that will sideline him for about six months.
snippet: David Beckham was back on his feet and walking on crutches in Turku, Finland, a day after having surgery to repair the torn Achilles’ tendon that will sideline him for about six months.
